text:
Thanks!
Message 1767 of 4024
I’m having a really hard day today.
Sent:03/01/2024 at 01:38 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 03/01/2024 at 01:38 PM)
Subject:Re: Visitation
Message 1768 of 4024
I’m sorry... please let me know if there is honestly anything in this world I can do to help.
I can prepare dinner here and just drop it off on the porch, I can help with any driving that needs to be done tonight. I can go pick up dry cleaning or
help you with some shopping. I can also just be a friendly ear and talk through work issues and ignore all this nonsense. I have some background there
and some experience that I’m always happy to share with you as you know.
Please help me help you. I mean that sincerely.
Sent:03/01/2024 at 01:41 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/01/2024 at 01:42 PM)
Subject:Re: Visitation
Message 1769 of 4024
I want to be super clear about this offer to help. Just because it's the weekend does not mean that the work goes away. Even if it is paused. And I
would hate to have you stressed during your limited time away.
So... I noted some offers below. But it stands for the whole weekend till you get caught up. Short of you going on a date, if you just give me a todo list
for the kids, errands or tasks I will work it in and execute w/o discussion.
We were a solid team once, and we can put the drama aside for a weekend and work together. We are still married and should help one another. I'll
quit bugging you about this stuff, too. I'll even book you a foot massage!
For all my faults and trespasses, you know I liked to pamper and spoil you. Please let me know.
Sent:03/01/2024 at 02:06 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/01/2024 at 04:58 PM)
Subject:Re: Visitation
Message 1770 of 4024
Did you want to have Adrian hang with you tomorrow after basketball? Drop off around 7:30 assume after your dinner?
Sent:03/01/2024 at 05:00 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 03/01/2024 at 05:01 PM)
Subject:Adrian
